metadata.name: Runs Continue Past Mother in Greed Mode
metadata.directory: runs continue past mother in greed mode
metadata.description:
This mod is based on [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2493403665]Runs Continue Past Mother[/url]. It allows you to continue on to Sheol or the Cathedral after fighting Mother in Greed Mode.
This mod requires: [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2925565414]Alt Path + Mother in Greed Mode![/url] [/list]
It also supports: [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2813909722]The Cathedral in Greed Mode![/url] [/list]
